data.text: “O na ũmũthĩ gũteta gwakwa no kũrũrũ;
No anjũkĩrĩre na ũhoti wake mũnene?
Hau-rĩ, mũndũ mũrũngĩrĩru no atware ciira wake mbere yake,
“No rĩrĩ, ingĩthiĩ mwena wa irathĩro, we ndarĩ kuo;
Hĩndĩ ĩrĩa arĩ wĩra-inĩ mwena wa gathigathini, ndimuonaga;
Magũrũ makwa moimĩte makinya make thuutha;
Niĩ nditiganĩirie maathani ma mĩromo yake;
“No rĩrĩ, arũgamaga arĩ o wiki; nũũ ũngĩhota kũregana nake?
Kĩu nĩkĩo gĩtũmĩte nyiitwo nĩ kĩmako ndĩ mbere yake;
Mũrungu nĩatũmĩte ngoro yakwa yũrwo nĩ hinya;
